title: Provides that appearance enhancement businesses in the city of New York shall be maintained and operated in accordance with the provisions of the city health code
summary: Provides that appearance enhancement businesses in the city of New York shall be maintained and operated in accordance with the provisions of the city health code.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1898

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 12, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. WRIGHT, ROBINSON, MENG, BARRON, REILLY, LANCMAN,
         TOWNS, MILLMAN -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M.  of  A.  FARRELL,  PHEFFER,
         WEISENBERG -- read once and referred to the Committee on Cities

       AN  ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the regulation
         of appearance enhancement businesses in the city of New York

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The opening paragraph of section 404 of the general busi-
    2  ness law is designated subdivision 1 and a new subdivision 2 is added to
    3  read as follows:
    4    2. IN ADDITION TO THE PROVISIONS OF SUBDIVISION ONE OF  THIS  SECTION,
    5  ANY  APPEARANCE ENHANCEMENT BUSINESS LOCATED WITHIN THE CITY OF NEW YORK
    6  SHALL BE MAINTAINED AND OPERATED IN ACCORDANCE WITH  THE  PROVISIONS  OF
    7  THE CITY HEALTH CODE WHERE APPLICABLE.
    8    S  2.  This  act  shall take effect on the sixtieth day after it shall
    9  have become a law, provided, however,  that  effective  immediately  the
   10  addition,  amendment  and/or  repeal of any rule or regulation necessary
   11  for the timely implementation of this act upon its  effective  date  are
   12  hereby  authorized  and  directed to be made on or before such effective
   13  date.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05652-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the regulation of appearance enhancement businesses in the city of New York
